name: collection
description: Allows you to create and administer Search collections.

params.name: engine
params.description: This attribute only exists for compatibility reasons to other CFML engines, the attribute is completely ignored by Lucee.

params.name: categories
params.description: Used only for creating a collection

params.name: collection
params.description: Specifies a collection name or an alias if action = "map"

params.name: path
params.description: Absolute path to a Lucene collection.

params.name: language
params.description:
language the collection is based on:

possible values are: english, german, russian, dutch, french, italian, norwegian, portuguese, spanish, brazilian, chinese, greek, thai, danish, japanese, norwegian, korean

params.name: name
params.description: Name for the query results returned by the list action.
